=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Caress Body Wash, Pure Embrace 12 oz
Review Date: 2016/06/03
Store: Caress
Product Description: ['Want to feel irresistible every day? Sink into the silky touch of Caress Pure Embrace, a delicately scented body wash infused with the scent of fragrant white flowers and pampering almond oil. Zesty citrus top notes tantalize the senses before opening up to a seductive heart of delicious sweet mango, nectarine, red currants and delicately perfumed florals. At the base of this fine fragrance shower gel are warm woody notes of cedarwood, white musk and vanilla that round out and soften the scent to create a beautifully complex perfume that lingers on your skin. Caress Pure Embrace is an indulgent and pampering body wash that blends rich, luxurious lather with expertly crafted fine fragrance. It is the body wash that gently cleanses your skin, leaving you feeling silky-soft and gorgeously perfumed each time you bathe. Make your daily shower one to remember as you delight in the fine fragrance and lavish lather of Caress Pure Embrace. Be left feeling wrapped in the soft embrace of irresistibly silky and exquisitely perfumed skin. Caress body wash and beauty bar fragrances are crafted by the world’s best perfumers to transform your daily shower into an indulging experience that will make you feel special every day.']
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Caress', 'Scent': 'Citrus, Almond, Musk, Vanilla, Mango, Cedar', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8.1 x 3.2 x 1.5 inches; 14.72 Ounces', 'UPC': '011111471184'}
Review Text: This stuff smells so good and it leaves your skin literally feeling softer. I love it and will continue to buy it. Highly recommended.
Review Title: This stuff smells so good and it leaves your skin literally feeling softer
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual exhibits a clear preference for high-quality beauty and personal care products, often seeking items that enhance aesthetics and provide a delightful sensory experience. They generally rate products highly, favoring those with consistent performance and effective results, as evidenced by multiple 5-star ratings for nail-related items and body care products. The recurring themes of user-friendliness and versatility in products, such as makeup tools for various applications, underline their inclination toward multifunctional items.

A notable sensitivity to scent and texture is apparent, shown by their strong appreciation for body wash and hairspray that deliver both appealing fragrances and desirable skin or hair quality. While overall satisfaction is high, the lower rating for eyebrow products suggests a distinct requirement for balance in application and outcome, indicating they value efficacy without compromising natural appearance.

Price sensitivity does not seem to dominate the purchase pattern, as they frequently opt for premium products with a history of positive feedback. However, they appreciate good value, hinting at a willingness to invest in products that deliver a luxurious experience and effective results. In sum, the core preferences revolve around effective beauty applications, pleasing sensory attributes, and a balance of quality and user-friendliness.
